cobblemon.species.stunfisk-galar.desc: Living in mud with a high iron content has given it a strong steel body. Its conspicuous lips lure prey in as it lies in wait in the mud. When prey gets close, Stunfisk clamps its jagged steel fins down on them.
cobblemon.species.bronzor.desc: Implements shaped like it were discovered in ancient tombs. It is unknown if they are related. X-ray photos were taken to check its body structure. Nothing appeared, however.
